cause.description:
HIV today is increasing on a regular day basis .. we have to spread sex education to all groups of society to help in the cause ! To think that you and your family can not be infected will not help. To feel ashamed talking about this topic is a shame in itself..
-->Awareness is the prevention. -->Over Confidence is the cause.
Lets join hands n ROCK IT !
1. Awareness is the Prevention.
2. Carelessness is the cause.
3. Love and care is all you can do and all they ask for.
cause.name: H.I.V awareness
